Mewdeko Docs
Edit this page

Class RoleGreets

The RoleGreets module provides commands for managing role greet messages within a Discord guild. These messages are sent when a user receives a specific role, allowing for custom greetings or information to be shared automatically.

RoleGreets(InteractiveService, HttpClient)

The RoleGreets module provides commands for managing role greet messages within a Discord guild. These messages are sent when a user receives a specific role, allowing for custom greetings or information to be shared automatically.

public RoleGreets(InteractiveService interactivity, HttpClient http)
Parameters
Type Name Description
InteractiveService interactivity
HttpClient http

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

RoleGreetAdd(IRole, ITextChannel?)

Adds a new role greet message for a specified role. If no channel is specified, the current channel is used.

Declaration
[Cmd("RoleGreetAdd")]
[Aliases("RoleGreetAdd")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task RoleGreetAdd(IRole role, ITextChannel? channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IRole role

The role for which the greet message is being set.
ITextChannel channel

The text channel where the greet message will be sent. Optional.
Returns
Type Description
Task
| Edit this page View Source

RoleGreetDelete(int, StoopidTime)

Updates a role greet message to be automatically deleted after a specified duration.

Declaration
[Cmd("RoleGreetDelete")]
[Aliases("RoleGreetDelete")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[RequireBotPermission(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task RoleGreetDelete(int id, StoopidTime time)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int id

The ID of the role greet to update, based on its position in the list of all role greets.
StoopidTime time

The duration after which the greet message will be deleted, specified in seconds or as a human-readable string.
Returns
Type Description
Task

int howlong

The duration, in seconds, after which the greet message will be deleted.

RoleGreetMessage(int, string?)

Updates the message content of a role greet. If no message is provided, presents options to preview the message as is or view it as regular text.

Declaration
[Cmd("RoleGreetMessage")]
[Aliases("RoleGreetMessage")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task RoleGreetMessage(int id, string? message = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int id

The ID of the role greet to update, based on its position in the list of all role greets.
string message

The new message content. Optional.
Returns
Type Description

| Edit this page View Source

RoleGreetWebhook(int, string?, string?)

Configures a webhook for a role greet message, allowing for custom name and avatar. If no name is provided, the webhook is disabled.

Declaration
[Cmd("RoleGreetWebhook")]
[Aliases("RoleGreetWebhook")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[RequireBotPermission(GuildPermission.ManageWebhooks)]
public Task RoleGreetWebhook(int id, string? name = null, string? avatar = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int id

The ID of the role greet to configure the webhook for, based on its position in the list of all role greets.
string name

The name of the webhook. Optional.
string avatar

The URL of the avatar for the webhook. Optional.
Returns
Type Description
Task

Implements

Discord.Commands.IModuleBase

Extensions.ThrowIfNull<T>(T, string)
